participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and slightly sarcastic, enjoys engaging with others in a light-hearted manner.
participant_1.background: A recent college graduate, Alex loves exploring new ideas and meeting people from different walks of life.

content.text: You know how to type a messages, right?
